body_html:
The readme in the makefile page clearly states this is the case.
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile

The supported way to build tensorflow is to use bazel. Makefile is only maintained to build for iOS, and will provide an incomplete build of tensorflow.

The supported way to build tensorflow is to use bazel. Makefile is only maintained to build for iOS, and will provide an incomplete build of tensorflow.
body:
The readme in the makefile page clearly states this is the case.
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile

The supported way to build tensorflow is to use bazel. Makefile is only maintained to build for iOS, and will provide an incomplete build of tensorflow.
